newsitem.title: USA: Noble has stake in Windermere production.
newsitem.headline: Noble has stake in Windermere production.

text.p: Noble Affiliates Inc said Thursday natural gas production has started from the Windermere field, located in the southern natural gas basin of the North Sea.

The field is producing 5.2 million cubic feet of natural gas and 88 barrels of condensate per day from one well, net to the company's 20 percent interest. An additional development well is currently being drilled, which is expected to be placed on production by the third quarter, Noble said.
The natural gas is being sold under long-term contract to continental Europe at a price which is about 25 percent higher than U.S. spot gas prices, the company said.
The partners in the field are Wintershall (U.K.) Ltd, the operator with a 60 percent working interest, and Sovereign Exploration Ltd, with a 20 percent working interest.
